name: Lunch Menu
description: Our lunch menu features a delightful fusion of Cambodian classics and international favorites, offering a variety of fresh vegetables, aromatic herbs, and savory proteins. Enjoy flavorful stir-fries, hearty rice dishes, and vibrant salads, all crafted with locally sourced ingredients. Whether you're craving a light, healthy option or a comforting, satisfying meal, our lunch selection promises something delicious for everyone to enjoy in a cozy, welcoming atmosphere.
